resources.string: Copyright © 2015 – 2016 Celery Soft. All rights reserved.
We recommend that switch your phone to portrait mode to get the best possible experience using
Use same deck as last game
Use new deck different from last game
Please make sure everyone has his own player, and play the game one by one as the order above.
, after u shut down this dialog and flip any card, the game will begin and the timer will start. Good luck and achieve high score.
No more than 4 players, leave other guys watching :D
Tips: you can review the tutorial whenever you want.
let me graduate from the tutorial

Welcome to It Takes Two, the rule of the game is quite simple, After flipping one card, flip another card will start matching. Every time you match failed has a 2 points penalty. Matching same suit score 4 points, Matching same rank gain 16 points. Be careful, every flipping cost 1 point. So, let us begin, please flip first card.
\nIt is a ♥️2, every time you flip a card cost 1 point, so your score new is -1. 你肯定迫不及待要翻第二张牌了，但是在翻牌之前，请先将第一张牌翻返回，因为你不知道第二张牌是什么，如果和第一张牌无法成功匹配的话，会扣掉2分，所以，先将第一张牌返回去。
\nGreat, first card is ♥️2, what about the second card? check it now!
Let us check what second card is~
\n好的，这是一张红心6，和第一张牌红心2的花色相同，匹配之后能得4分。我们注意到，这是你第二次翻牌，又扣了1分，所以你的分数是-2。那么，快翻开第一张牌，把扣掉的分数都赚回来吧。
Flip first to match same suit~
\n非常好，我们发现，第一张牌和第二张牌匹配成功，无法再次翻动了。现在你的分数是1分，花色匹配成功得4分，翻了3次牌扣3分。嗯，你也许会认为我太啰嗦了，但我只想向你强调的是，必须锻炼自己记牌的能力，同一张牌，最好只翻一次。那么，我们看看第三张牌是什么吧。
It is time to flip third card~
\n第三张是方片A，好的，接下来看看第四张。还是老样子，把第三张牌翻回去，再看第四张。
Flip over third card before flipping 4th card~
\nGood, let ue see what 4th card is, flip it now.
\n这竟是一张黑桃A，第三张是方片A，他们点数相同，匹配能获得16分！快翻开第三张牌进行匹配。
What are you waiting for? flip third card to gain 16 points～
\n怎么样，获得16分的感觉如何？我们来统计一下，你总共翻了6次牌，扣6分，花色匹配成功一次得4分，点数匹配一次得16分，最后得分是16。点击任意牌继续
Congratulations! you have finished the tutorial, please help your self graduate from the tutorial by clicking the button in bottom
Congratulations! you have finished the tutorial, please help your self graduate from the tutorial by clicking the button in bottom
You need to install Wechat before sharing screenshots to Wechat
Need to connect to the internet first, you could retry it under the Wi-Fi
